book.title: Sojourn
book.author: Robert A. Salvatore
book.description: The dark elf Drizzt Do'Urden hits the surface. Behind all the horrors of his native Menzoberranzan and years of wandering in the Underdark, now a completely different life awaits him. However, the surface will not become a calm haven for Drizzt, here a harsh reality awaits him, in no way inferior to the Underdark in anger, danger and harsh reality.
